job.title: Cloud DevOps Engineer
job.description:
The Cloud DevOps&nbsp;Engineer&nbsp;will be working with the engineering team and focusing on AWS/Azure/GCP/OCI infrastructure and automation.&nbsp;A key part of the role is championing and leading infrastructure as code. The other major role is developing and maintaining the Python scripts to support the automation jobs.&nbsp;The Engineer will work closely with Dev/QA team to support our SaaS product base upon the public cloud platform.   Duties & Responsibilities:  - Design cloud infrastructure that is secure, scalable, and highly available on AWS   
  - Work collaboratively with software engineering to define infrastructure and deployment requirements   
  - Provision, configure and maintain AWS/Azure/GCP/OCI cloud infrastructure defined as code   
  - Ensure configuration and compliance with configuration management tools   
  - Administer and troubleshoot Linux based systems   
  - Troubleshoot problems across a wide array of services and functional areas   
  - Build and maintain operational tools for deployment, monitoring, and analysis of AWS/Azure/GCP/OCI infrastructure and systems   
  - Develop and maintain the infrastructure-related Python tools.   
  - Work with developers to develop business-level Python tools.    
   Qualifications:  - At least 3-5 years of experience building and maintaining AWS infrastructure (VPC, EC2, Security Groups, IAM, ECS, CodeDeploy, CloudFront, S3)   
  - Strong understanding of how to secure AWS environments and meet compliance requirements   
  - Hands-on experience deploying and managing infrastructure with Terraform   
  - Hands-on experience developing with Python.   
  - Solid foundation of networking and Linux administration   
  - Experience with Docker, GitHub, Jenkins, ELK and&nbsp;deploying applications on AWS   
  - Ability to learn/use a wide variety of open source technologies and tools   
  - Strong bias for action and ownership
